name: Scooby-Doo! Case File #3: Frights! Camera! Mystery!
name_original: Scooby-Doo! Case File #3: Frights! Camera! Mystery!
description:
Scooby-Doo! Case File #3: Frights! Camera! Mystery! is an educational puzzle game developed by The Learning Company. It came out on 08-06-2007. The Learning Company published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Scooby-Doo! Case File #3: Frights! Camera! Mystery! is available on PC.
